title: The Sami, four lands, one people
creator_credit: Hubert Schuurman, Bill Brind and National Film Board of Canada
brief_description: There are 35,000 Sami who live in Norway, Sweden, Finland and the Soviet Union. Northern development is affecting their traditional way of life that had an economy based on reindeer-herding. The film shows how they are trying to find a way between old traditions and new development.
